name: Murasaki (itch)
description:
"The evil behind the gate threatens the land of the apostles once more. With the floating daemon sword by your side you must eliminate the three ancient tribes and open the gate in this bullet hell inspired action adventure."

Hack n' Slash action!
Shmup style bullet patterns!
Large interconnected world!
Multiple weapons to pick up and use!
Cool dash move!

Student game. Top down hack n' slash, developed by No Dating Studios at The Game Assembly.

Credits:

Artists
Pontus Canbäck - Adam Karlsson - Elsa Varland    

Level Designers
Oscar Maris - Kevin Osgyan

Programmers
Filip Carkic - Morris Gustafsson - Sebastian Grape - Henrik Phan -
Mattias Ringström
